body.name: Epic Medical Supply First Aid Burn Relief Cream .9g Packets Box of 144 with Lidocaine and Benzalkonium Chloride for Minor Scrapes, Cuts, and Skin Irritations, Home and Medical Skincare,

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Epic Medical Supply Store

Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 15 hrs 13 mins
features: Fast-Acting Burn Relief Cream – Formulated to help heal and protect your skin, our burn healing cream contains Lidocaine and benzalkonium chloride to reduce discomfort, soothe skin, and accelerate the healing process to help minimize potential infection.

Clean and Protect Minor Wounds – This burn cream for first aid kits can be used on a variety of different minor scrapes, cuts, burns, and wounds which makes it a great topical ointment for hands and feet, elbows and arms, legs and back, face, and more.

Moisturizes and Soothes Sensitive Skin – While essential for treating minor wounds our skin burn healing cream also helps hydrate skin and lock-in moisture which is important for soothing irritation, reducing itching and burning, and dissipating heat.

Topical Lidocaine HCl Relief – We infused our burn ointment first aid cream with lidocaine HCl to provide extended relief where you need it most, so kids and adults don’t have to worry about the burning sensation found in alcohol-based solutions.

Quick, Easy Application Process – This cream first aid burn ointment for kids and adults is easy to apply across the entire wound and can be left uncovered or covered up with a bandage (not included) for enhanced skin protection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Relieve Minor Skin Irritations Great for cuts, scrapes, burns, itchy insect bites, scratches, and minor skin irritations, our first aid cream provides more effective versatility when it comes to healing and repairing your skin. This makes it essential for supporting kids and adults of all ages.

Full-Body Topical Application From scraped knees to scuffed elbows to burned fingers our first aid burn cream works all over the body to provide faster recovery support. This topical cream provides better coverage over skin irritations and works to lock-in moisture throughout the healing process.
Minimize Further Damage Along with supporting the healing process our burn cream may also help minimize the appearance of scars or marks which is important for maintaining even tone and balance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars handy to have around on the job
reviews.reviewText: Good product for small tool burns

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can be a bit hard to open but seem to work well
reviews.reviewText: I like having the small packets so I can keep some in the kitchen, some in the mud room (closer to the grill), some to take on the go and then leave the rest in our cupboard. The cream feels nice on a burn and seems to work well. The only issue I have is I sometimes have a little problem opening it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It gives relief.
reviews.reviewText: I am using this for a large wound I have on each arm due to being exposed to a poisonous plant. Nothing really helps for it, it just has to heal over time. It's often stinging and itchy so I figured that I should try this first aid cream. It feels cold on my arm after applying it and it definitely gives relief for the itchy and stinging feeling I constantly have.It's a bit awkward that this is in individual tiny packages. This reminds me a bit of having the squeeze ketchup out of those packages at a fast food place.On the other hand, the tiny package idea is really good for first aid kits.I'd say this is a very good product to have and I put some in my purse just to have around in case I need them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as described.
reviews.reviewText: Individually packed burn cream, easy to use and a must have for every first aid box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First aid must have
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these small packets of burn gel. Each pack contains just enough and provides great relief. They are the perfect addition to my med kit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice to have onhand
reviews.reviewText: It's always nice to have burn cream on hand, and I like that this can be used for other wound care as well as burns. Not real super keen to burn myself to try it out for that. These little packets contain lidocaine and Benzalkonium Chloride for numbing and antiseptic purposes, and are easy enough to pack in a purse, car, camping box, or first aid kit. Nice to have around. Right now it's a nice visual gag that we slide across the table when someone lands a real zinger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have come in handy a few times
reviews.reviewText: These are awesome individual burn cream packets that you can stash just about anywhere. I have some in the obvious places, like the first aid kits... but also keep some in the glove box, the stroller, the diaper bag, at the mountain bike saddle bag, etc. Very handy to have on hand.
